thread.title: Another Delightful Stay at the Haymarket -
thread.title_full: Another Delightful Stay at the Haymarket - Review of Haymarket Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lulubell
title: Another Delightful Stay at the Haymarket -
text: Found myself in London for a night unexpectedly due to missed flight connection, so booked last minute into the Haymarket. As always it was truly lovely. Had a big corner room on the third floor, bathroom with separate tub and shower was also quite large. Breakfast was offered at a discount at the time of booking, and this is a really good value as the breakfast is delicious and has a generous offering of fresh fruits, yogurts, juice, to beverages, breads and many choices for hot dishes.
